footer.brandsFor: 200+ brands for service stations, detailing & tuning shops
footer.aboutText: Since 2007, onecompany has been shaping the culture of premium tuning and providing uncompromising support.
footer.description: Leading tuning importer since 2007. We work with service stations, tuning studios, detailing studios, and shops in many countries worldwide.

services.installationDesc: A network of partners for installation of any complexity worldwide
services.deliveryDesc: Fast and secure worldwide delivery with full support

visualization.title: Visualize on Your Car
visualization.subtitle: Carbon parts and wheels — see the result before installation

contact.title: Contact a Specialist
contact.subtitle: Didn't find what you were looking for? We will find it for you

exhaust.line1: Full titanium systems, slip-ons and track exhausts with FIM homologation and proven power gains.
exhaust.line2: Designed for WorldSBK, MotoGP and track days.

suspension.line1: Cartridges, fully adjustable forks and rear shocks with dyno-matched shim stacks and link geometry.
suspension.line2: From road comfort to track-level damping control.

wheels.line1: Carbon and forged aluminum wheels with radial calipers, sport pads and floating discs.
wheels.line2: Reduced unsprung mass and stable braking for lightweight bikes.

carbon.line1: Pre-preg carbon fairings, tanks, wings and crash guards for weight reduction and track legality.
carbon.line2: FIM-certified kits with custom paint finishes.

controls.line1: Adjustable rearsets, clip-ons, billet levers and quickshifters for precise control and faster lap times.
controls.line2: CNC-machined with multiple positions for track ergonomics.

electronics.line1: ECU flashes, quickshifter modules, traction control and GPS telemetry for data-driven tuning optimization.
electronics.line2: From road unlocking to full track telemetry.

about.intro: Since 2007, we have been shaping the culture of premium tuning and providing uncompromising support after installation.

brandsPage.title: Brands
brandsPage.logoDisclaimer: Logos shown where available – others use a placeholder until assets are added.

landing.welcomeText: OneCompany has been active since 2007 as a distributor for premium aftermarket brands in the automotive & motorcycle industry. We've built strong relationships with trusted partners across Ukraine and beyond.
landing.expertSelectionDesc: Our team of specialists provides personalized consultations to select the perfect performance parts for your specific vehicle and requirements.
landing.globalNetworkDesc: Access to certified installation partners worldwide, ensuring professional fitment and optimal performance of all components.
landing.premiumSupportDesc: Comprehensive after-sales support and technical assistance to ensure complete satisfaction with every purchase.
landing.brandsDesc: We represent over 200+ world-leading brands in performance automotive and motorcycle parts
landing.wheelsBrakesDesc: Forged wheels, brake kits, calipers, rotors
landing.carbonFiberDesc: Aero parts, interior trim, performance upgrades
landing.interiorDesc: Seats, steering wheels, roll cages, gauges
landing.upgradeDesc: Contact our specialists for personalized recommendations and expert advice on premium performance parts

hero.title: We engineer flagship builds.
hero.subtitle: ONE COMPANY unites 200+ premium brands and uses its experience for the best solution.

narrative.title: Your partner with global coverage
narrative.paragraph1: We started as enthusiasts dreaming about fast cars. Today we are a team of professionals managing complex tuning programs and carrying out wholesale deliveries to various countries of the world.
narrative.paragraph2: The team 24/7 controls supply conditions, compatibility and timelines to make your dream project flawless.
narrative.paragraph3: This is not e-commerce. This is partnership: transparent terms, colossal experience and premium service.

curation.title: Curated brand access
curation.description: Direct lines to world-leading manufacturers with priority allocations, limited runs, and bespoke finishes.

integration.title: Integration & visualization
integration.description: Fitment and visual presentations to select the perfect solution.

partnerNetwork.title: Own logistics
partnerNetwork.description: Fulfillment centers in the USA and Europe, enabling door-to-door delivery fast and affordably.

consulting.title: Advisory
consulting.description: Lifestyle-oriented consultations that map goals, budgets, and timelines before the first part is ordered.

procurement.title: Procurement
procurement.description: Supply-chain management with consolidated logistics, customs handling, and condition reports on arrival.

installation.title: Installation & QA
installation.description: On-site technical oversight plus multi-point QA so every build leaves aligned, calibrated, and warrantied.

aftercare.title: Aftercare
aftercare.description: Lifecycle support covering seasonal refreshes, warranty coordination, and future upgrade planning.

2007.title: Origins
2007.description: First orders started in Kyiv. Procurement and delivery of tuning from the USA.

2008.title: USA Fulfillment Center
2008.description: Dedicated warehouse and logistics hub for consolidating shipments from North America.

2016.title: Europe Fulfillment Center
2016.description: Centralized order collection from European manufacturers and further dispatch.

2022.title: Global Network
2022.description: Installation partners worldwide and direct door-to-door DHL delivery.

2023.title: Consulting & Selection
2023.description: Expert support: from concept and component selection to full project organization.

cta.title: Bring your next build to life
cta.subtitle: Send us your chassis, wishlist, and timeline—we will curate the program and coordinate importer logistics.

hero.heading: Get in touch
hero.subheading: We will select the optimal kit for your car or motorcycle. Specify make, model, year and preferences — we will provide a solution.

info.title: Contact information
info.description: Managers help with part selection, logistics and installation support. Leave a message — we will respond within one business day.
